translation.en: -Here you go. -♪ Nails, hair, hips, heels ♪
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: Ooh! Nothin' like a chip clip to save the day, honey.
translation.zh: 没有什么是夹子搞不定的

translation.en: Taken right from my Cheeto bag.
translation.zh: 这夹子是我刚从薯片袋子里拿出来的

translation.en: I'm kidding. Am I? Been up since 3:00 a.m. I have no idea who I am!
translation.zh: 开玩笑的 我从凌晨三点忙到现在 整个人都懵了

translation.en: -Hey, Mavis? -I'll be right there, okay?
translation.zh: -梅维斯-马上就来

translation.en: [Mavis] Ooh! Looking good.
translation.zh: 很不错

translation.en: Let me see this right here.
translation.zh: 把这个放进去

translation.en: Perfect.
translation.zh: 大功告成

translation.en: Oh, did you know your hand is making a fist?
translation.zh: 拳头握这么紧做什么？

translation.en: Sorry. I'm just nervous. First Essence shoot.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我太紧张了第一次给《本质》杂志拍照

translation.en: Repeat after me.
translation.zh: 跟我默念

translation.en: I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.zh: 我光芒万丈 无所不能 乘风破浪

translation.en: I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.zh: 我光芒万丈 无所不能 乘风破浪

translation.en: You got this, bitch. Just breathe.
translation.zh: 相信自己 深呼吸

translation.en: -Okay. -Hey.
translation.zh: -好的-嘿

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Marissa's dress won't stay up, and she scratched me, definitely on purpose.
translation.zh: 玛丽萨的裙子提不起来 她还故意抓我

translation.en: Okay. Just put some double-stick tape on her titties. And… let's see.
translation.zh: 给她的胸上贴双面胶就行了

translation.en: Do I have some still? Goldfish.
translation.zh: 我看看有没有啊？给你一袋金鱼小吃

translation.en: Do you know models and toddlers have the same diet?
translation.zh: 你知道模特和小孩都喜欢吃这个吗？

translation.en: -Copy that. Also Trent wants to see you. -Yes, he does.
translation.zh: -明白 特伦特想见你-知道了

translation.en: -♪ I don't dance… ♪ -Here we go.
translation.zh: 来了

translation.en: -♪ I work… ♪ -Beautiful.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: Here you go.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: These are not the ones I wanted.
translation.zh: 我要的不是这双

translation.en: This is exactly what you asked for.
translation.zh: 你要的就是这双

translation.en: Mavis?
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: I… I'll figure it out.
translation.zh: 我再找找看

translation.en: -♪ And I might let you see… ♪ -How am I supposed to know what you want?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道你究竟想要哪双啊？

translation.en: -I'm not a mind reader. -[man] Yes.
translation.zh: -我又不会读心术-很好

translation.en: I hope this isn't too forward, but I know beauty when I see it,
translation.zh: 我希望你不要觉得我太过唐突 你太美了

translation.en: and the camera loves you.
translation.zh: 我就是忍不住要拍你

translation.en: Is that right?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Well, it must be my drumstick-emoji physique.
translation.zh: 一定是我曼妙的身姿吸引了你

translation.en: It's meaty on top, nubby on the bottom. Very delicious.
translation.zh: 该大的地方大该小的地方小 秀色可餐

translation.en: That's what it is. You must be one of those models, huh?
translation.zh: 没错 你一定是模特吧？

translation.en: Me? A model? For Essence?
translation.zh: 我？《本质》杂志的模特？

translation.en: [man] Yes.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: They could never afford me, honey.
translation.zh: 他们可请不请我 亲爱的

translation.en: -[camera clicking] -[man] Sorry, baby. That's it.
translation.zh: 抱歉 宝贝 就是这样

translation.en: -I can't take anymore. Come here. -Oh, come on. What?
translation.zh: -我受不了了 过来-拜托 搞什么啊？

translation.en: [Trent] Yuck.
translation.zh: 好恶心

translation.en: Mavis, you're distracting genius.
translation.zh: 梅维斯 你别给摄影师添乱

translation.en: -[Mavis] Huh. -Don't worry about him.
translation.zh: 不用理会他

translation.en: All right. When we're done, I have to do a bunch of stuff for him.
translation.zh: 好了 待会我还得帮他做一大堆事情

translation.en: I'm gonna meet Khalil, so I'm gonna be home late.
translation.zh: 还要去见卡里尔所以要很晚才能回家

translation.en: At least we get time together at work today.
translation.zh: 至少今天上班期间我们还能在一起

translation.en: -Yeah, I love you so much. -I love you, baby.
translation.zh: -是啊 我好爱你-我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: -See you-- -[Trent] Mavis!
translation.zh: -梅维斯-咱们…

translation.en: I'm coming. God!
translation.zh: 来了 天啊

translation.en: [woman] It's just…
translation.zh: 这…

translation.en: I don't like it. It's not working.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢 感觉不对

translation.en: -[woman] Trent, I don't like it. -Okay, message received, Sydney.
translation.zh: 特伦特 我不喜欢这种造型 好的 收到 悉尼

translation.en: Mavis, we gonna need some help here.
translation.zh: 你来搭把手

translation.en: -On it. -♪ Girl ♪
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -♪ I don't play, I slay ♪ -Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -Okay, so wait until I tell you. -[model] Gotcha.
translation.zh: -你就保持这个姿势-明白

translation.en: Mavis, you need to remember I'm the lead stylist.
translation.zh: 梅维斯 你要记住 我才是首席造型师

translation.en: I styled Mariah Carey into Mariah Christmas,
translation.zh: 玛丽亚凯莉在爆款专辑里面的造型可是我设计的

translation.en: and this is gonna look ridiculous.
translation.zh: 这个造型也太扯了吧

translation.en: It's gonna be fire.
translation.zh: 一定会火的

translation.en: -You ready, baby? -I got you.
translation.zh: -准备好了吗 亲爱的？-好了

translation.en: Okay. Now!
translation.zh: 好 开始！

translation.en: -This is beautiful. -♪ Drop for me… ♪
translation.zh: 真美

translation.en: [Sydney] Looks like a butterfly, a fashion butterfly. I love this.
translation.zh: 就像一只蝴蝶时尚的蝴蝶 我喜欢这个造型

translation.en: Got it.
translation.zh: 搞定

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Trent, why didn't you think of this?
translation.zh: 你怎么想不到这样的创意？

translation.en: Mark that one. Mark that one. You know what? Just mark them all.
translation.zh: 留下这张 都留下吧

translation.en: Sydney, you know my girlfriend, Mavis Beaumont?
translation.zh: 悉尼 这是我女朋友梅维斯博蒙特

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: Nice to meet you. I'm such a fan.
translation.zh: 很高兴认识你 久仰大名

translation.en: Well, now I can say the same about you.
translation.zh: 这句话应该由我来说

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Syd, you know, obviously, it's time for Mavis to move to lead stylist.
translation.zh: 悉尼  梅维斯有资格做首席造型师

translation.en: Didn't you say you were doing a layout with Lizzo's dancers? She'd kill that.
translation.zh: 你不是说你要给丽珠的伴舞设计造型吗？她可是不二人选

translation.en: Lizzo and the Big Grrrls? That is my jam.
translation.zh: 是“丽珠和大女孩”节目吗？我超喜欢

translation.en: Well, that would be a pretty high-profile piece for your first lead job, but, um…
translation.zh: 你第一次上手就接触这种大制作…

translation.en: I don't know. After what you did today, yeah, I think we should talk.
translation.zh: 我想想啊 鉴于你今天的表现 我们可以聊聊

translation.en: I'll have my office reach out. We'll set up a meeting for… Friday?
translation.zh: 我的工作室会联系你的安排周五面试可以吗？

translation.en: Amazing! That'd be amazing. Oh my God! Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 太棒了 天啊 非常感谢

translation.en: -Thank you, baby! -Awesome, baby. You got this.
translation.zh: 太棒了 亲爱的 你可以的

translation.en: -[Mavis] Hey. -[man] Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-嘿

translation.en: Sorry I'm running late.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我回来晚了

translation.en: Trent sent me all over town returning shit.
translation.zh: 特伦特让我把那些道具都还回去

translation.en: Let me tell you somethin'. I am so over assisting.
translation.zh: 告诉你 我实在不想做助理了

translation.en: All good. I'm running behind myself.
translation.zh: 好 我马上过来

translation.en: Good game.
translation.zh: 厉害啊

translation.en: Okay, quit playing.
translation.zh: 好 别闹了

translation.en: Trying to make me do overtime, knowing I got somewhere to go.
translation.zh: 我还有事呢 打什么加时赛啊

translation.en: Who you got over there?
translation.zh: 刚才是谁啊？

translation.en: Let's just call her basket bae.
translation.zh: 是卡特 篮球宝贝

translation.en: More like basket hay. I know that's right.
translation.zh: 是篮球骚货吧

translation.en: -[man chuckles] -Listen, I had to stop home.
translation.zh: 我得在家好好休息

translation.en: I've had to pee for 42 whole-ass minutes. You know I'm too cute for a public toilet.
translation.zh: 我已经整整憋尿憋了42分钟了 我可不想上公共厕所

translation.en: Bitch, please. But I started to pee just a little bit.
translation.zh: 拜托 我要尿崩了

translation.en: Why is there always a TMI situation with you when it come to peeing in the bathroom?
translation.zh: 为什么我每次打电话你都在厕所里尿尿？

translation.en: Let me tell you, you're gross. You're my best friend, but you're gross.
translation.zh: 你太恶心了你虽然是我最好的朋友 但你很恶心

translation.en: Baby, Jesus Christ. What are you doing home?
translation.zh: 天啊 你怎么回来了？

translation.en: What in the actual fuck, Jacque?
translation.zh: 到底是怎么回事？雅克？

translation.en: -Oh shit! -[Jacque] No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
translation.zh: -该死！-不要啊！

translation.en: Mavis, no. Think about what you're doing before you do it. -Don't go all Jersey on us. -[Mavis grunts]
translation.zh: 梅维斯 你要顾全大局 别动粗

translation.en: Don't hurt him!
translation.zh: 别打他！

translation.en: [shrieking] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -[Jacque] Chill! -[Mavis] Get off of me!
translation.zh: -冷静！-放开我！

translation.en: Get off of me!
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: Get off!
translation.zh: 放开我

translation.en: ♪ One time For the big girls in the crowd ♪
translation.zh: 《大码女孩的生存之道》

translation.en: I just got this feeling I'mma find a dildo up in here.
translation.zh: 我感觉我会找到成人玩具

translation.en: I'm not a monster. Those are the first things I packed.
translation.zh: 我又不是疯子那些东西我早就打包好了

translation.en: -I gotta get somethin' from the bathroom. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 我得去厕所拿点东西 好

translation.en: [Mavis screaming] Fuck him!
translation.zh: 去他妈的！

translation.en: -You didn't hear anything, did you? -No. Nope.
translation.zh: -你刚没听到吧？-没有

translation.en: Oh no, no. Don't take that. That's Jacque's. It stays.
translation.zh: 别 那是雅克的 给他留下

translation.en: Uh, we taking everything that's worth somethin' in here, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要把所有值钱的东西都拿走 明白吗？

translation.en: So I'm just gonna put this in the bag.
translation.zh: 我要把这个拿走

translation.en: We got that in Mozambique.
translation.zh: 那是在莫桑比克买的

translation.en: That's the trip where he asked me to move in with him.
translation.zh: 我们当时去那旅游的时候他就提出和我同居

translation.en: It was like a princess fairy tale.
translation.zh: 当时就像公主和王子的童话故事一样

translation.en: Look at this place.
translation.zh: 你看看这里

translation.en: Look at him.
translation.zh: 看看他

translation.en: Look at you.
translation.zh: 看看你

translation.en: Look, I know Jacque come from money, but you held him down.
translation.zh: 我知道雅克没钱 是你一直养着他

translation.en: You supported that man emotionally and financially, right?
translation.zh: 你在感情上和经济上都在全力支持他 对吧？

translation.en: Don't forget that.
translation.zh: 别忘了

translation.en: You pulled your own, working them two jobs.
translation.zh: 你身兼两份工作

translation.en: Waitressing at night and then being his studio manager during the day?
translation.zh: 晚上当服务员白天做他的工作室助理

translation.en: -Come on. -Yeah, fuck that dude. You know what?
translation.zh: -对吧-是啊 去他的 你知道吗？

translation.en: -I did hold his ass down. For many years. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我确实养了他好多年

translation.en: And I never brought up marriage, ever. He always brought it up.
translation.zh: 我从未提起过结婚这事他总在我面前念叨个不停

translation.en: And he never even put a ring on it. God!
translation.zh: 但他从未向我求过婚 天啊 我一直都是围着他在转

translation.en: It's always been about what he wants, what works for him.
translation.zh: 天啊 我一直都是围着他在转

translation.en: And that's why I'mma take his Fendi jacket too.
translation.zh: 所以我要把他的芬迪外套拿走

translation.en: 'Cause if you gotta see his dick in another woman,
translation.zh: 他敢在你面前和其他女人乱搞

translation.en: he should see that jacket on another man.
translation.zh: 那就让其他男人也去穿他的外套

translation.en: And not just any other woman. A skinny model version of me?
translation.zh: 他竟然按照我的样子找了一位苗条的模特

translation.en: Like, how fucking hurtful and basic.
translation.zh: 我这张脸真是被他丢尽了

translation.en: And you know what people say.
translation.zh: 你知道别人怎么说吗？

translation.en: If someone cheats on Halle Berry, they're like, "Oh my God."
translation.zh: 如果哈莉贝瑞的男友背着她出轨别人会说“天哪”

translation.en: "How that man cheat on Halle Berry?" But if someone cheats on someone like me?
translation.zh: “他怎么能背着哈莉贝瑞偷吃？”但如果换做是我呢？

translation.en: A thick girl… with problem areas?
translation.zh: 一个死肥宅？

translation.en: They're like, "Oh yeah, I get it."
translation.zh: 他们会说 “我懂了”

translation.en: You know everyone talks, Khalil. That's what they say.
translation.zh: 你懂的 他们一定会这么说的

translation.en: They're like, "He's the hot photographer, and I'm just lucky to be with him."
translation.zh: 他们会说 “他可是性感的摄影师我能和他在一起是我的福气”

translation.en: -Okay, stop. -Khalil?
translation.zh: -好 别说了-卡里尔

translation.en: -Mave. -Khalil.
translation.zh: -梅维斯-卡里尔

translation.en: Stop.
translation.zh: 别说了

translation.en: Do not breathe life into that silly-ass narrative.
translation.zh: 别这么自轻自贱

translation.en: When somebody cheats,
translation.zh: 他背着你偷吃

translation.en: that's them trying to stroke they own ego.
translation.zh: 那是他不知好歹

translation.en: Plus,
translation.zh: 而且

translation.en: don't you always be the one saying thick girls having a moment?
translation.zh: 你不经常说胖妞命好吗？

translation.en: It's "mo-ment."
translation.zh: 是人胖有福气

translation.en: Sorry. Say it again?
translation.zh: 抱歉 你再说一遍

translation.en: "Mo" like a Monique, but "meant" like "mo-ment."
translation.zh: 人胖有福气

translation.en: -"Mo-ment"? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -有福气-是的

translation.en: Yes. Yes. "Mo-ment."
translation.zh: 对 是有福气

translation.en: Thick girls having a "mo-ment."
translation.zh: 胖妞有福气

translation.en: Time to have that "mo-ment."
translation.zh: 你的福气要来了

translation.en: -Okay. -[softly] All right.
translation.zh: -好吧-是

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you too.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我也爱你

translation.en: Now where does Jacque keep his cameras?
translation.zh: 雅克把相机放在哪儿？

translation.en: Mavis, can we please talk?
translation.zh: 梅维斯 能聊聊吗？

translation.en: What you need?
translation.zh: 要我出手吗？

translation.en: Just give us a minute.
translation.zh: 等我一下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Wait. Is that my jacket, fam?
translation.zh: 等等 那不是我的外套吗？

translation.en: My nigga, you got way bigger problems than this jacket.
translation.zh: 傻逼 还外套呢 你麻烦可大了

translation.en: Come on, Mavis.
translation.zh: 拜托 梅维斯

translation.en: Right now I'm so, so sorry. We can't throw five years away.
translation.zh: 非常抱歉 但这五年的感情不能说断就断啊

translation.en: Look, it only happened this one time. I swear.
translation.zh: 我就偷吃过一次 我发誓

translation.en: We can work this out.
translation.zh: 我们好好聊聊

translation.en: We're supposed to be married,
translation.zh: 我们要结婚

translation.en: have kids,
translation.zh: 生孩子

translation.en: do all that Bonnie and Clyde shit.
translation.zh: 做一对像邦妮和克莱德那样的鸳鸯大盗

translation.en: Jacque, I know things weren't perfect,
translation.zh: 雅克 我知道人无完人

translation.en: but you coulda let me know you weren't happy before you stepped out.
translation.zh: 但你和别人上床前应该告诉我你跟我在一起不开心啊

translation.en: I know that. And I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 对不起

translation.en: -Babe, let me make it up to you. -No!
translation.zh: -请给我机会补偿你-算了

translation.en: Where you gonna go?
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: I'mma keep it moving and keep my plants watered.
translation.zh: 我要替自己做打算了

translation.en: Yo.
translation.zh: 哟

translation.en: Do I look crazy? I feel crazy.
translation.zh: 我看起来是不是有病？跟疯子一样

translation.en: Yes, you look crazy.
translation.zh: 是的 你看起来很疯狂

translation.en: I'm moving you to Brooklyn to live with a total stranger…
translation.zh: 我帮你搬到布鲁克林去还要跟一位陌生人同居…

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: …who could be a serial killer, or worse, an investment banker.
translation.zh: 对方可能是位连环杀手或者更糟 是位投资银行家

translation.en: Really? Those are my only two options?
translation.zh: 真的吗？我命中注定遇到这两类人吗？

translation.en: Come on, Khalil. Roommatefinder.net is a legitimate website, okay?
translation.zh: 拜托 卡里尔贝壳网是合法的租赁网站好吗？

translation.en: I paid three whole dollars to sign up. I saw it on a bus, so I know it's real.
translation.zh: 我花了三美元注册我在公交车上看到过广告 是真的

translation.en: And I FaceTimed Jade at least four and a half minutes,
translation.zh: 我和杰德视频了至少四分半钟

translation.en: and she had kind eyes and, um, didn't ask for my credit score,
translation.zh: 她眼神很善良 也没问我的信用评分

translation.en: which is like the most important.
translation.zh: 这才是最重要的

translation.en: Yeah. Sounds… Yeah. Oh shit, Mavis. Get up.
translation.zh: 对 听起来…该死 梅维斯 收拾东西

translation.en: -We gotta go. -What? Why? -We gotta go. We gotta go. -Why?
translation.zh: -下车-什么？为什么？

translation.en: Lisa Bonet top hat.
translation.zh: 是我前女友

translation.en: Oh God, Khalil! Are you serious?
translation.zh: 天啊 卡里尔 你别开玩笑好吗？

translation.en: When you gonna stop running from women you slept with? We are 38 years old!
translation.zh: 你什么时候开始逃避炮友了？我们都38岁了

translation.en: Obviously never. Move your feet!
translation.zh: 才不是呢 快闪

translation.en: Sorry my friend's a ho!
translation.zh: 抱歉 都怪我朋友喜欢乱约炮

translation.en: It's an emergency!
translation.zh: 事出紧急！

translation.en: [Mavis] Hello?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: Mavis, hi!
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: -Hi! -Hi. Welcome! Welcome!
translation.zh: -嗨！-欢迎光临

translation.en: Namaste.
translation.zh: 纳玛斯特！

translation.en: To you too. So nice to finally meet you, Jade.
translation.zh: 纳玛斯特 终于见到你了 杰德

translation.en: -Um, where's my bedroom? -Right behind you.
translation.zh: -我的卧室在哪？-在你身后

translation.en: -Oh! -Yeah, I feng shui-ed it and everything.
translation.zh: -哦-里面的风水格局都是我布置的

translation.en: Oh, thank you. It's great.
translation.zh: 哦 谢谢你 太棒了

translation.en: -Sorry, uh, this is my best friend Khalil. -Oh my…
translation.zh: -抱歉 这是我最好的朋友 卡里尔-天啊

translation.en: [Jade] Hi. Hi. Well, if you're her best friend, you're my best friend.
translation.zh: 嗨 如果你是她最好的朋友那你就是我最好的朋友

translation.en: [Khalil] Yeah. So, Jade,
translation.zh: 杰德

translation.en: I just touched this chair,
translation.zh: 我刚刚摸了下这张椅子

translation.en: and now there's a greasy film, like, inside of my hand,
translation.zh: 现在我手上有一层黏糊糊的东西

translation.en: and you don't have a Jheri curl, so I don't… That's not what that is.
translation.zh: 这是啫喱水还是什么？

translation.en: But if you could walk me through all of this?
translation.zh: 能解释一下吗？

translation.en: It's just olive oil.
translation.zh: 是橄榄油

translation.en: Yeah. I just put it all over my body, my hair, all the time.
translation.zh: 对 我喜欢给身体和头发涂橄榄油

translation.en: It just… It's so wonderful for you.
translation.zh: 橄榄油对身体非常有益

translation.en: And, yeah, any time, like, my body needs love, I rub it in.
translation.zh: 每当我护理身体的时候就要抹它

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Like a little pasta dish, you know?
translation.zh: 就像做意大利面料理一样

translation.en: I think I will not do that.
translation.zh: 我反正不会这么做

translation.en: Yeah. That's… Thank you though. That was very…
translation.zh: 非常谢谢 真的

translation.en: -Oh shit! That pillow got feet. -What?
translation.zh: -该死 枕头怎么还张脚了-什么？

translation.en: -[Jade] It's my kitty cat. It's Coco. -Oh.
translation.zh: 是我的猫咪 叫可可

translation.en: -[Jade] It's Coco. -You never mentioned you had a cat.
translation.zh: 你没说你还养猫啊

translation.en: [Jade] Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊不惊喜！

translation.en: -His full name is Cocaine Xavier. -[Mavis] Of course it is.
translation.zh: 他的全名是可卡因泽维尔 猫起这个名字简直太霸气了

translation.en: -That is a very strong name for a cat. -Snort him up.
translation.zh: 猫起这个名字简直太霸气了 我没事就吸猫玩

translation.en: Are you gonna be okay here?
translation.zh: 你确定要住这里吗？

translation.en: [whispers] I, um…
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不确定

translation.en: [whispers] She's fine.
translation.zh: 放心吧 她没事的

translation.en: -Lord! -Wow. Lord Jesus.
translation.zh: -天哪-哇

translation.en: [man] Excuse me. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: -Oh, there's some room over here. -Thanks. Thank you.
translation.zh: -这边有空位-谢谢

translation.en: Oh shit! Camden?
translation.zh: 不是吧 卡姆登？

translation.en: -Damn, Mavis! How you be? -Good.
translation.zh: -是你啊 梅维斯 你还好吗？-很好

translation.en: Oh my goodness. What's up? What you doing in these parts?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Oh, I just moved in around the corner.
translation.zh: 我刚搬到这里

translation.en: What's it been? Like, two years?
translation.zh: 你搬过来多久了？两年？

translation.en: Something like that. Two years, yeah.
translation.zh: 差不多有两年

translation.en: Yo, those agency days were fun.
translation.zh: 真怀念当初在经纪公司的时候

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you look good. How are you?
translation.zh: 对啊 你看起来状态不错 你过得还好吗？

translation.en: Oh shit! Was that a compliment from Mavis Beaumont?
translation.zh: 梅维斯博蒙特竟然夸口赞我了

translation.en: I look good? You look good.
translation.zh: 问我还好吗？你看上去不错

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Let me buy you a drink, boo.
translation.zh: 让我请你喝一杯

translation.en: Sure. Why not? I'll stay for one more. Let's catch up.
translation.zh: 可以啊 那我就再待一会 咱们叙叙旧

translation.en: Hell yeah. Let's get all up in the mustard and ketch-up.
translation.zh: 好啊 那咱们就怀念一下激情燃烧的岁月

translation.en: [chuckles] That was good. America's Got Talent, ayo!
translation.zh: 太好了 这里是《美国达人秀》请开始你的表演

translation.en: Nah, I low five.
translation.zh: 握个手就行了

translation.en: Oh!
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. It's dangerous in these streets.
translation.zh: 这边治安不好 要看紧钱包

translation.en: -I keep my hand near my wallet. -I think I heard that.
translation.zh: 这边治安不好 要看紧钱包 我略有耳闻

translation.en: You fuck around and high-five and get robbed.
translation.zh: 你太高调的话容易被抢

translation.en: I… I heard Shaun King talk about that.
translation.zh: 我听尚恩金说过这些事情

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I actually have a shot at my first lead styling gig.
translation.zh: 我得到了一个首席造型师的工作机会

translation.en: Do you remember, um, Sydney Dubois from Essence?
translation.zh: 你记得《本质》杂志的悉尼杜布瓦吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm meeting her tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我明天要去见她

translation.en: -Oh… -Yeah. -Yeah, yeah. -Yeah!
translation.zh: -记得-对

translation.en: Yeah. You better walk into your story and keep your plants watered, shorty.
translation.zh: 你要走好自己的路 替自己做好打算

translation.en: Oh my God! I always talk about watering my plants.
translation.zh: 我的天！我经常讲这句话

translation.en: That is wild.
translation.zh: 太不可思议了

translation.en: Do you, Mavis.
translation.zh: 做你自己 梅维斯

translation.en: You mad special, mad talented, mad beautiful.
translation.zh: 你独一无二 聪明伶俐 性感动人

translation.en: Thanks, Cam.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 卡姆登

translation.en: I don't wanna get too excited, though, because her office hasn't confirmed yet,
translation.zh: 我不想高兴的太早因为她的工作室还没跟我确认

translation.en: and Jacque did the introduction, so--
translation.zh: 是雅克引荐的我 所以…

translation.en: No, no. Not Jacque. Jacque. I always knew Jacque was a dummy.
translation.zh: 在我看来雅克就是个蠢货

translation.en: I should call him right now and thank him
translation.zh: 我应该打给他 好好感谢他

translation.en: because one man's trash is another man's treasure. You feel me?
translation.zh: 他觉得你无所谓但你在别人那里可是宝贝 明白吗？

translation.en: I do feel you, and I don't know why.
translation.zh: 明白 但我不知道你说这话什么意思

translation.en: You drop-dead beautiful. Beautiful Beaumont.
translation.zh: 你美得不可方物 简直是人间尤物啊

translation.en: Some motherfuckers just don't understand how good they have it.
translation.zh: 那个混蛋就是不懂得珍惜

translation.en: -Do me a favor. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -帮我个忙-好

translation.en: Remind me why you wouldn't go out with me.
translation.zh: 你当初为什么不跟我交往？

translation.en: I had a boyfriend at the time.
translation.zh: 我那时有男朋友呢

translation.en: Really, Mavis. Fuck that dude. Let's stop talking about him.
translation.zh: 梅维斯 去他的 别提那个王八蛋了

translation.en: Because if you were ever my girl,
translation.zh: 如果你跟了我

translation.en: the whole bedroom would be the Vatican, and you'd be my Olivia Pope.
translation.zh: 那我就把你当皇上一样整天敬着

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: That is, like,
translation.zh: 从来没有人

translation.en: the sweetest thing anyone's ever said to me.
translation.zh: 跟我说过这么甜蜜的情话

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: I'm single. I'm single!
translation.zh: 我是单身！

translation.en: Oh shit!
translation.zh: 该死！

translation.en: Who that be?
translation.zh: 谁啊？

translation.en: It's Sydney Dubois's office.
translation.zh: 是悉尼杜布瓦工作室打来的

translation.en: They're confirming my meeting for tomorrow.
translation.zh: 他们要确认明天的面试

translation.en: Well, go on. Tell 'em who you are.
translation.zh: 好啊 告诉他们你是谁

translation.en: Okay!
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I'm Marvis Bormont, bitch!
translation.zh: 老子是梅维斯博蒙特！

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: [Mavis] Oh my God. Oh.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Camden] Mm. Oh, Mavis, you taste so good. -[Mavis] Mm. -Taste so good.
translation.zh: -梅维斯 你好香啊-是

translation.en: [Mavis] It's the cardamom from the halal truck
translation.zh: 我吃了清真烤肉

translation.en: and the… the Baileys from the screaming orgasms.
translation.zh: 还喝了尖叫高潮鸡尾酒

translation.en: [Camden] Mm. Mavis. Mm! Oh, Mavis.
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: Oh, Camden, no!
translation.zh: 卡姆登 别！

translation.en: What? Why is everything covered in olive oil?
translation.zh: 什么？怎么到处都是橄榄油？

translation.en: Oh my God. Why won't you go down?
translation.zh: 我的天啊 怎么冲不下去

translation.en: -♪ Clap up like a round of applause… ♪ -You're okay. You're fine.
translation.zh: 没事

translation.en: -♪ Clap clap clap clap… ♪ -You're still pretty.
translation.zh: 你依然很美

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I'm just… This is me single, okay?
translation.zh: 我是单身 好吗？

translation.en: And it's messy, and it's gross,
translation.zh: 刚才搞得一团糟 有些恶心

translation.en: and I'm really sorry, um, and…
translation.zh: 我真的很抱歉 还有就是…

translation.en: I'm just so tired, and my tits are so heavy…
translation.zh: 我很累 我感觉我的奶沉甸甸的…

translation.en: Just come over here, and let me be your TA.
translation.zh: 过来 让我抚慰一下你的心灵

translation.en: My what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Your titty assistant.
translation.zh: 抚慰你的奶啊

translation.en: You are beautiful as fuck, no matter what.
translation.zh: 无论怎样你都是人间尤物

translation.en: And that's for real, for real.
translation.zh: 我说这些都是真心话

translation.en: So let me water them plants, girl.
translation.zh: 你听我安排就是了

translation.en: [Mavis] Oh!
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Jacque-y.
translation.zh: 雅克

translation.en: I'm so hungover.
translation.zh: 宿醉感好严重啊

translation.en: I'm the motherfucking Allen-wrench master.
translation.zh: 通用扳手在我手里能玩转

translation.en: Can't nobody build shit like me.
translation.zh: 修家具没人比过我

translation.en: They should call me Fix James.
translation.zh: 他们应该叫我鲁班大师

translation.en: I fix broke shit. I fix fixed shit.
translation.zh: 东西坏了就找我

translation.en: I'm here to fix shit.
translation.zh: 有我在 问题不大

translation.en: We have not seen this type of crazy in a very long time.
translation.zh: 很久没见过这种神人了

translation.en: It's not helpful.
translation.zh: 别对我含沙射影

translation.en: You had sex with him.
translation.zh: 你可刚跟他上过床啊

translation.en: That feels judgy. Okay.
translation.zh: 真是刀子嘴 好吧

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey, look at this. All this with an Allen wrench, boo.
translation.zh: 你看看 我用一把通用扳手就搞定了

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Wonderful. Um…
translation.zh: 你太棒了

translation.en: I think you could tell this is not the best version of me right now, and so, um…
translation.zh: 你也能看出来 我现在状态不好

translation.en: I'm sorry, but this just isn't gonna work out.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们俩不合适

translation.en: [Camden] It's a particle-board bookshelf.
translation.zh: 这是颗粒板书架

translation.en: I mean, it ain't all that, but, you know, it's…
translation.zh: 虽然不全是用的颗粒板…

translation.en: You put my bed frame together too.
translation.zh: 你还把我的床架拼好了

translation.en: He also fixed the tub.
translation.zh: 他还把浴缸修好了

translation.en: And you fixed the tub?
translation.zh: 你把浴缸修好了？

translation.en: Look, I am fresh out of a relationship,
translation.zh: 我刚失恋

translation.en: and, um, quite frankly, you shouldn't be so available for a person
translation.zh: 坦白说 如果你不清楚别人对你的感觉

translation.en: when you don't know how they feel about you.
translation.zh: 那就不要急着开始一段感情

translation.en: You are a great guy. Honestly, you are. You, um…
translation.zh: 你是个好人 确实是你就像是一款做工精细的胸罩

translation.en: You are like a well-made bra, honey. You are supportive and uplifting,
translation.zh: 你是个好人 确实是你就像是一款做工精细的胸罩 能够撑起我的大胸

translation.en: and your positive affirmations are so dope,
translation.zh: 你那种支撑感令我非常陶醉

translation.en: and boy, you are very good at other stuff too.
translation.zh: 你在其他方面也很厉害

translation.en: I'm talkin' 'bout the pussy stuff, Camden.
translation.zh: 我是指床上功夫

translation.en: Very nice. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常棒 非常感谢

translation.en: Camden, there is somebody out there for you,
translation.zh: 卡姆登 你的真命天女还在等着你

translation.en: and she's gonna be so lucky when she finds you.
translation.zh: 有你是对方的福气

translation.en: Damn, ma.
translation.zh: 我干

translation.en: I'm just glad you told me that shit and kept it 100.
translation.zh: 我很高兴你能跟我说这些掏心窝子的话

translation.en: Yo, I usually just get ghosted, but this was real as fuck.
translation.zh: 一般我约会完对方就不回我信息了 但这次不一样

translation.en: Come here, man. Let me get a hug.
translation.zh: 过来 让我抱一下

translation.en: I need my wrench back.
translation.zh: 把扳手还我

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Mavis Beaumont, wake up! -Oh, oh!
translation.zh: 梅维斯博蒙特 快起床

translation.en: I'm up.
translation.zh: 起来了

translation.en: I'm up. Why you gotta scare me like that?
translation.zh: 起来了 你为什么要吓我？

translation.en: How are you indoors but still look homeless?
translation.zh: 你怎么感觉还是一副无家可归的样子？

translation.en: Okay, that's not nice.
translation.zh: 你说这话可就伤人了

translation.en: Why aren't you ready? I thought we was gonna go eat before your meeting?
translation.zh: 怎么还没收拾好？不是约好面试前一起吃饭吗？

translation.en: Oh. What time is it? I gotta call Sydney and reschedule.
translation.zh: 哦 几点了？我要给悉尼打电话重新安排时间

translation.en: -I can't do this now. -No, no.
translation.zh: -现在过去可不行 你做什么？-不行

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Man, you ain't rescheduling.
translation.zh: -现在过去可不行 你做什么？-不行 -不要改期-什么？把手机还给我

translation.en: Uh-uh. Give me my phone back. What you doin'?
translation.zh: -不要改期-什么？把手机还给我

translation.en: -No. -Give me my phone back.
translation.zh: -你在做什么？-别 -把手机还给我-你在做什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Why are your arms so long?
translation.zh: -把手机还给我-你在做什么？ 怎么你的手这么长？

translation.en: Why do you know so many weird guys?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么多奇奇怪怪的朋友？

translation.en: She takin' a bagel in the bathroom?
translation.zh: 她竟然在卫生间吃百吉饼？

translation.en: I am not letting you miss out on this opportunity.
translation.zh: 我不会让你错过这么宝贵的机会

translation.en: Khalil, I am exhausted,
translation.zh: 卡里尔 我很累

translation.en: and I don't have the energy to start over.
translation.zh: 我没有精力去参加面试

translation.en: I can't go in there and be my dynamic self.
translation.zh: 我现在没法找回状态

translation.en: I just got cheated on.
translation.zh: 我刚被男友劈腿

translation.en: I need time to heal.
translation.zh: 我需要时间疗伤

translation.en: Plus, last night, I had some cardamom and strange dick,
translation.zh: 而且昨晚我吃了清真烤肉 还啃了别人的鸡鸡

translation.en: so I'm digesting a lot of things right now.
translation.zh: 我需要时间好好消化一番

translation.en: Mavis, night one?
translation.zh: 梅维斯 你玩一夜情？

translation.en: I mean…
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: Look, you not ready for this. Also, with who?
translation.zh: 看来你还没准备好 你跟谁啊？

translation.en: You remember Camden from the agency?
translation.zh: 你记得经纪公司的卡姆登吗？

translation.en: Not fucked-up-teeth, can't high-five?
translation.zh: 不喜欢和人击掌的那个人吗？

translation.en: Yeah. He just got a new motorcycle jacket from Macy's,
translation.zh: 他从梅西百货买了一件新机车夹克

translation.en: and I don't know what happened.
translation.zh: 然后我就不知道发生了什么

translation.en: It was like a ghetto episode of British Bake Off,
translation.zh: 就像是参加美食节目一样

translation.en: but just with dick and street meat.
translation.zh: 嘴里含着鸡鸡就是一顿乱啃

translation.en: Mavis.
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: And I'm not talking 'bout the dick being the street meat, but it could've been.
translation.zh: 我也不知道到底吃的是清真烤肉 还是鸡鸡

translation.en: I didn't know what the fuck I was eatin'.
translation.zh: 傻傻分不清楚

translation.en: Khalil, now you know why I gotta cancel.
translation.zh: 卡里尔 现在知道我为什么要取消面试了吧

translation.en: No, no. You cannot cancel.
translation.zh: 不 你不能取消

translation.en: Look, stop telling yourself no before somebody else tells you no.
translation.zh: 听着 不要急着否定自己

translation.en: That's beautiful.
translation.zh: 这话很让我受用

translation.en: -Let me ask you this. Rapid fire. -All right. Hit me.
translation.zh: 我问你几个问题 快问快答 好 来吧

translation.en: How long you been talking about being lead stylist?
translation.zh: 你念叨做首席造型师多久了？

translation.en: Like, in years?
translation.zh: 好几年了吧

translation.en: How many times you had the opportunity to be lead stylist?
translation.zh: 像这样的机会你遇到过几次？

translation.en: None.
translation.zh: 一次也没有

translation.en: How many times you been to work for something really important hungover?
translation.zh: 你有多少次为了重要的事情而宿醉？

translation.en: -How many Mondays in a year? -Exactly. Come on, girl. You can do this.
translation.zh: 一年有几个星期一？ 加油 你可以的

translation.en: Now, go find a pencil and draw on some eyebrows,
translation.zh: 现在赶快去拿眉笔画眉毛

translation.en: and then put them dots under your eyes to do whatever that do.
translation.zh: 然后用那个什么遮住眼睛下面的瑕疵

translation.en: -What do you call that stuff? -It's concealer.
translation.zh: -叫什么来着？-遮瑕膏

translation.en: Conceal that shit, okay? And do whatever else women do to get ready.
translation.zh: 遮住那些瑕疵 赶快收拾好自己

translation.en: A'ight? Get you some ibuprofen and coconut water, and go get that shit.
translation.zh: 吃点布洛芬 喝点椰子水 拿下面试

translation.en: -♪ What you gonna let them see? ♪ -[Sydney] Wow. Yeah, I'm liking this.
translation.zh: 哇 我喜欢

translation.en: I love it. You're so talented, Mavis.
translation.zh: 我喜欢 你真的很有才华 梅维斯

translation.en: -These are gorgeous mock-ups. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -这些造型很惊艳-谢谢

translation.en: I could see Jacque really running with this. He's so good with movement.
translation.zh: 雅克一定能拍出这种感觉他很擅长捕捉动作

translation.en: Yeah. Jacque is… really good with movement.
translation.zh: 对 他很擅长捕捉动作

translation.en: I, um… I don't think it's a great idea for us to collaborate on this together, though.
translation.zh: 我觉得还是不要让我跟他一起搭档

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -真的吗？-嗯

translation.en: Because he said he'd only shoot this if you were the lead stylist.
translation.zh: 他说只有你做首席造型师他才答应拍照

translation.en: -He did? -[Jacque] Hey, babe.
translation.zh: 是吗？ 亲爱的

translation.en: Sydney, didn't I tell you how amazing she is?
translation.zh: 悉尼 我跟你说过她很厉害吧

translation.en: She's great.
translation.zh: 她很棒

translation.en: No. No. Mm-mm. No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: No, thank you. Absolutely not. I am not doing this.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 绝对不行 我不干

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -Mavis, don't be ridiculous.
translation.zh: -你说什么？-梅维斯 别胡闹啊

translation.en: What's happening here? Did I miss something?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？有什么误会吗？

translation.en: Jacque and I are no longer working together, okay?
translation.zh: 我没法和雅克共事

translation.en: And I would love to stand here and say it's either him or me,
translation.zh: 有他没我

translation.en: but I already know how that's gonna go, so…
translation.zh: 我已经知道结果了 所以…

translation.en: I just wanna make sure that the answer is…
translation.zh: 我还是想跟你确认一下留他还是留我…

translation.en: Yeah, it's gonna be him.
translation.zh: 对 我留他

translation.en: Thank you for my iPad.
translation.zh: 谢谢 把平板电脑还我

translation.en: Mavis.
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: Mavis?
translation.zh: 梅维斯

translation.en: -Mavis, please. -What?
translation.zh: -梅维斯 别走-什么？

translation.en: All right, just take a minute. I know you're upset with me,
translation.zh: 等一下 我知道你很难过 但你别意气用事

translation.en: but just try and leave the emotion out of this.
translation.zh: 我知道你很难过 但你别意气用事

translation.en: I can help get this career off the ground--
translation.zh: 我可以帮你搞定工作上的事儿

translation.en: Let me stop you right there, okay? Please do not flatter yourself.
translation.zh: 打断你一下 拜托 你不要自以为是

translation.en: I have everything I need to make my own way.
translation.zh: 我靠自己也能成功

translation.en: Jacque, I loved you, and I would've done anything for you.
translation.zh: 雅克 我爱过你我曾愿意为了你赴汤蹈火

translation.en: But my identity got mixed up with yours, and I let you take the lead.
translation.zh: 但我却错把你我混为一谈一切都以你为中心

translation.en: And I got lost. But you know what?
translation.zh: 我曾经迷失了自己 但你知道吗？

translation.en: Here the fuck I am.
translation.zh: 我他妈现在觉醒了

translation.en: ♪ Hey ♪
translation.zh: 字幕翻译：温暖
